definition: to a greater degree or extent
details:
adverb
- to a greater degree or extent
= example: to a greater degree or extent
= synonyms: even
- despite anything to the contrary, usually following a concession
= example: despite anything to the contrary, usually following a concession
= synonyms: however
- up to the present time
= example: up to the present time
- used in negative statement to describe a situation that has existed up to this point or up to the present time
= example: used in negative statement to describe a situation that has existed up to this point or up to the present time
= synonyms: so far
- used after a superlative
= example: used after a superlative
= synonyms: so far
- within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time
= example: within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time
= synonyms: in time
